title: Mr. Magorium's Wonder Emporium
content:
A research in the forums (also via Google) did not show a link to this - maybe I was not obstinate enough - but anyway:

[http://mmbase.submarinechannel.com/titlesequences/video.jsp?video=29847](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020022941/http:/mmbase.submarinechannel.com/titlesequences/video.jsp?video=29847 "http://mmbase.submarinechannel.com/titlesequences/video.jsp?video=29847")
author: Katharina

comments.content:
Amazing that the people who did the poster didn't get the note about how the title's were to look. They look nothing alike.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020022941im_/http:/typophile.com/files/magorium-mod_4430.jpg)

Perfect title. But also the [trailer](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020022941/http:/www.apple.com/trailers/independent/mrmagoriumswonderemporium/large.html) is pretty nice [uses [FF Danubia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020022941/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Danubia)]. Thank you for this interesting link, Katharina. A lot of stuff to watch …
